scripts.dev: npm run dev:serve && npm run start
scripts.dist: npm run lint && npm run dist:wp-theme && npm run dist:frontend && npm run image-optimize
scripts.preview:serve: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.preview.yml up -d && source .env && open http://localhost:$WP_PORT
scripts.setup:cp-core: docker compose cp wordpress:/var/www/html/wp-includes/ ./.wp/wp-includes && docker compose cp wordpress:/var/www/html/wp-admin/ ./.wp/wp-admin
scripts.pcs:install: docker compose exec -w /var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/post-content-sync wordpress composer install
scripts.pcs:sync: docker-compose exec -w /var/www/html/ wordpress wp content-sync sync --allow-root
